remarks: An edge of a graph always connects two vertices, analogous to ~ usgraedgrnv .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 7-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jan-2020.)
statement:
usgedgppr.e $e |- E = ( Edges ` G ) $.
usgpredgv.v $e |- V = ( Vtx ` G ) $.
usgpredgv $p |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ { M , N } e. E ) -> ( M e. V /\ N e. V ) ) $.
